Class DefensiveState

java.lang.Object
battle.DefensiveState
All Implemented Interfaces:
BossState
public class DefensiveState extends Object implements BossState
Week 12-04: DefensiveState (STATE PATTERN - Concrete State) Boss behavior when 50% >= HP > 25%: - AI: 60% DEFEND, 30% COUNTER, 10% MAGIC (defensive!) - Rules: MAGIC>DEFEND(40), DEFEND>ATTACK(25), COUNTER>MAGIC(45), ATTACK>COUNTER(30) - Transition: Goes to EnragedState when HP drops to 25% or below The boss becomes defensive, favoring DEFEND and COUNTER. MAGIC is the best choice to break through the defense!
